statusLine.command: bash -c 'input=$(cat); MODEL=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".model.display_name"); DIR=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".workspace.current_dir"); BRANCH=""; if git rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1; then BRANCH=" | ðŸŒ¿ $(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null)"; CHANGES=$(git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null | wc -l); if [ $CHANGES -gt 0 ]; then BRANCH="$BRANCH ($CHANGES)"; fi; fi; echo "[$MODEL] ðŸ“ ${DIR##*/}$BRANCH"'
